title: List of Individuals: Hinds County Coroners Office

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Mississippi Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to request access to public records regarding the individuals buried behind the local jail in Jackson, MS, specifically pertaining to Dexter Wade. I understand that the Hinds County Coroner's Office maintains a list dating back to 2016, as well as incident files for each individual.
I am seeking access to:
-The list of individuals buried behind the local jail maintained by the Hinds County Coroner's Office, including any available information regarding Dexter Wade and others dating back to 2016.
- The incident files or records related to each individual listed in the aforementioned burial records.
- The number of deaths, when the deaths occurred, the causes of death, and the names, age, and places of residence of those who died at Hinds County Detention Facility
Please consider this a formal request under the Mississippi Public Records Act; Miss. Code Ann. 25-61-1 et seq.. If any part of this request is unclear or requires further specification, please do not hesitate to contact me using the information provided above.
If there are any fees associated with obtaining or copying these records that exceed $100, I request a waiver of all fees. I am making this request on behalf of a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization, and the release of this information is in the public interest.
If possible, I would prefer to receive the requested documents electronically via email. However, if this is not feasible, please inform me of the available methods for obtaining these records.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Noelle

title: FOIA - FBI - Metal Gear

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: FOIA - FBI - Metal Gear
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All documents alerts mentioning "Metal Gear" or "Metal Gear Solid" created from January 1st 1997 to the date of this request.

Metal Gear was a video game series developed by Konami (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Metal_Gear).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

J Ader

title: Public Records Request - Hickory Hill Funeral Home, Memphis

communications.subject: Tennessee Public Records Act Request: Public Records Request - Hickory Hill Funeral Home, Memphis
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I would like to request copies of any records the Department of Commerce and Insurance's State Board of Funeral Directors and Embalmers has pertaining to the Hickory Hill Funeral Home in Memphis (5270 Knight Arnold Road). I am specifically seeking records related to the discovery of two deceased women in the home in March 2016. The types of records I am interested in include: complaints, site investigations, notices of violation (NOVs), return to compliance documentation, and those related to the suspension of the home's license (motions, complaints, summary judgments, etc.).

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Caitlin Downey.

title: Voting Rights Restoration

communications.subject: Alabama Open Records Law Request: Voting Rights Restoration
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Alabama Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

I would like to see how many persons have applied to have their voting rights restored in Alabama after convictions from the following states over a 10-year period. 

I would also like to know how many of these applicants successfully had their voting rights restored. 

The states I would like to look at are as follows:
 
California, Colorado, New York, Illinois, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Michigan, and Indiana.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

André Natta, a citizen of Alabama, in coordination with Bobby Mandelberg.

title: Correspondence from the offices of Rep. Randy Bridges, Rep. Chris Freeland, and Senator Robby Mills

communications.subject: Kentucky Open Records Act Request: Correspondence from the offices of Rep. Randy Bridges, Rep. Chris Freeland, and Senator Robby Mills
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Kentucky Open Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Copies of correspondence (physical or digital) to or from the offices of Rep. Randy Bridges, Rep. Chris Freeland, and Senator Robby Mills that include any of the following terms: Jones Act, Cato, Cato Institute, ALEC, American Legislative Exchange Council, American Waterways, Mark Wright.

2. With respect to digital correspondence (including emails) to or from the aforementioned offices, this includes the @americanwaterways.com address.

3. The date range of this request is January 1, 2023 through December 1, 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Caleb O. Brown

title: Court Proceedings Recordings

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Court Proceedings Recordings
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I request the court room audio and visual recordings for all proceedings for the following cases including 5 minutes preceding and proceeding the hearings:

CASE NO.:50-2022-CF-000242-AXXX-MB
CASE NO.:50-2021-DR-008983-NB-H
CASE NO.:50-2021-MH-003828-XXXX-MB
 

If there are redactions, please provide a redaction form and the state law that pertains to the redaction.

There should not be any fees associated pertaining to this request as the court has already stated that audio and visual recordings are to be provided, I would prefer the request be filled electronically, by e-mail attachment and/or download link as per Sunshine Law.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Mason C. turner

communications.subject: Thank you for contacting the Clerk & Comptroller, Palm Beach County
communications.communication:
Thank you for contacting the Office of Joseph Abruzzo, Clerk of the Circuit Court & Comptroller of Palm Beach County.  Your email is important to us, and we will respond to it in the order it was received.

LEGAL DISCLAIMER: Please note that your email to ClerkWeb@mypalmbeachclerk.com does not constitute legal service pursuant to Rule 2.516, Florida Rules of Judicial Administration.
www.mypalmbeachclerk.com<http://www.mypalmbeachclerk.com/>
[Description: Description: Description: http://www.twitter.com/ClerkPBC]<http://www.twitter.com/ClerkPBC>[Description: Description: Description: http://www.facebook.com/ClerkPBC]<http://www.facebook.com/ClerkPBC>[Description: Description: Description: http://www.mypalmbeachclerk.com/newsletter]<http://www.mypalmbeachclerk.com/newsletter>

Please be advised that Florida has a broad public records law, and all correspondence to me may be subject to disclosure.  Under Florida public records laws email addresses are public records. If you do not want your email address released in response to a public records request, do not send electronic mail to this entity. Instead, contact this office by phone or in writing.

communications.subject: RE: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Court Proceedings Recordings
communications.communication:
Good morning-

Thank you for contacting the office of the Clerk of the Circuit Court and Comptroller. The Clerk’s office does not maintain audio or visual recordings of court proceedings as that is the purview of the 15th Judicial Circuit Court Reporting Services team. Any requests for recordings of court proceedings would need to be directed to that department. You can locate information on the 15th Judicial Circuit’s website at Court Reporting Services | 15th Circuit<https://www.15thcircuit.com/services/court-reporting>.

Thank you

communications.subject: FW: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Court Proceedings Recordings
communications.communication:
Hello,

Thank you for contacting the Clerk of the Circuit Court & Comptroller.

I am responding to CASE NO.:50-2021-DR-008983-NB-H.  All other requests have been forward to the corresponding departments.

Request for court room audio and visual recordings for all proceedings must be done through the court,  please visit the courts website Court Reporting Services | 15th Circuit<https://www.15thcircuit.com/services/court-reporting>.
Best regards,
Clerk of Court

communications.subject: RE: Florida Sunshine Law Request #50-2021-DR-008983-NB-H
communications.communication:
Thank you for the information

Mason

title: Campaign Contributions

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Campaign Contributions
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

I would like a detailed document of all campaign contributions for the current Council members for the Town of Jupiter including dollar amount and the origination (name) of the contributions.

There should not be any fees associated pertaining to this request, I would prefer the request be filled electronically, by e-mail attachment as per Sunshine Law.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Mason C. turner

communications.subject: RE: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Campaign Contributions
communications.communication:
Good Afternoon,

You have reached the Public Affairs Department under the Board of Palm Beach County Commissioners. We do not have any responsive records.

Here is the contact information for the Town of Jupiter: https://www.jupiter.fl.us/1198/Public-Records

Sincerely,

[cid:image001.jpg@01DA284C.0D9A1C00]

PALM BEACH COUNTY
BOARD OF COMMISSIONERS
PUBLIC AFFAIRS | MEDIA & PUBLIC INFORMATION
561-355-2574| recordsrequest@pbcgov.org<mailto:recordsrequest@pbcgov.org>

communications.subject: RE: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Campaign Contributions
communications.communication:
Hi,

Thanks so much for your help with this request! I really appreciate it.

Sincerely,
Mason C. Turner

communications.subject: RE: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Campaign Contributions

title: Campaign Contributions and Council Proposal Documents (Town Of Jupiter)

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Campaign Contributions and Council Proposal Documents (Town Of Jupiter)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

A current financial spread sheet for the projected costs/budgets for the Jupiter Fire Department and also attached any PowerPoints, spreadsheets including other original documents such as proposed contracts presented during the town council meetings. 
Please also include our current contract with Palm Beach County Fire Rescue.

Secondly I would like a detailed document of all campaign contributions for the current Council members including dollar amount and the origination (name) of the contributions.


There should not be any fees associated pertaining to this request, I would prefer the request be filled electronically, by e-mail attachment as per Sunshine Law.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Mason C. turner

communications.subject: RE: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Campaign Contributions and Council Proposal Documents (Town Of Jupiter)
communications.communication:
Hello,

This is to acknowledge your public records request.

All documents presented to Council can be found on our website attached to the corresponding agendas. The Agenda website is here: https://www.jupiter.fl.us/AgendaCenter/Regular-Meetings-held-the-first-and-thir-4

As soon as the information is available, you will be contacted. If you have any questions, please contact me.

Please confirm receipt.


Nikki Carpenito, MBA, SHRM-CP
Senior Director

communications.subject: RE: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Campaign Contributions and Council Proposal Documents (Town Of Jupiter)

title: Records Request (City Of Palm Beach Gardens)

communications.subject: Florida Sunshine Law Request: Records Request (City Of Palm Beach Gardens)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Confirmation of employment of Jamie Smith ID#232 at Jupiter's (northcom) dispatch center, confirmation of employment, ID number and salary for 2022. Also Her date of hire and payment history up to 2022
The confirmation of employment of "Adam" ID#412 at Jupiter's (northcom) dispatch center, confirmation of employment, ID number and salary for 2022.
The confirmation of employment of "Courtney" ID#9426 at Jupiter's (northcom) dispatch center, confirmation of employment, ID number and salary for 2022.
The confirmation of employment of "Kristin" (on the clock at 12.5.23 ~7:35am) 'ID number refused upon request' she is 'employed' at the (northcom) PBG dispatch center, confirmation of employment, ID number and salary for 2022.

Please include the full names for all individuals stated and their ID numbers and their initial date of employment.

Also please state if it is within dispatch/communications policy to hang up on an individual during a call. Please also confirm that the email address turnermason@gmail is not blocked or restricted from sending mail to city/dispatch issued email addresses as this is unlawful.

There should not be any fees associated pertaining to this request, I would prefer the request be filled electronically, by e-mail attachment as per Sunshine Law.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Mason C. turner

title: Julian Assasnge Charges

communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Julian Assasnge Charges
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Please provide any and all documents /case files and any charges pertaining to Julian Assange DOB: July 3, 1971. And confirm if there is a criminal case and any pending criminal charges against this individual. If there are not any criminal charges pending against this individual, then his hold in Prison at Belmarsh in London, at the request of the United States Government is a violation of the United States Constitution and an unlawful detainment of a foreign citizen.

There should not be any fees to fulfill my request. Please send all documents via email.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Mason C. Turner

title: Chimneyrock Elementary Good News Club

communications.subject: Tennessee Public Records Act Request: Chimneyrock Elementary Good News Club
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Receipts and/or invoices and/or transaction information and/or emails related to Child Evangelism Fellowship and/or the Good New Club payment for facility use fee and/or facility rental fee from January 2022 to present day, emails related to Child Evangelism Fellowship and/or the Good New Club operating at Chimneyrock Elementary from January 2022 to present day, and documents, texts, emails with the keywords "Good News Club" and/or "GNC" and/or "Child Evangelism Fellowship" and/or "CEF" and/or "Satan" from January 2022 to present day.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Rachel Janes.

communications.subject: Thank you for your Open Records Request
communications.communication:
Submission Receipt

 

Dear Requester, 

 

 

This message is intended to acknowledge Shelby County Schools’ receipt of your recently submitted public records request, which is reflected below. 

 

 

 

 

Your Open Records Request has been received; however, due to COVID-19, please expect response time to your request to be slower than normal.

 

 

 

SCS appreciates your patience as it navigates continuity of operations in light of COVID-19.

 

 

 

Due to the upcoming Christmas Break, Shelby County Schools will respond to all requests submitted between December 19 - 22, 2020, on January 4, 2021.   Open Records Requests will not be accepted December 23, 2020, - January 3, 2021.  The Open Records Request Portal will reopen on January 4, 2021.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We apologize for any inconvenience.

 

 

Thank you!

Public Records Request Coordinator

Shelby County Schools

Form name Open Records Requests Date submitted Dec 6, 2023, 10:04AM EST Submission Details: *Receipt* 0002112 *First Name* Kent *Last Name* Hoover *Email Address* 155587-44762330@requests.muckrock.com *Are you requesting student transcripts, diplomas, cumulative records and/or other student records?* No *Please provide a brief description of your open records request identifying the SPECIFIC records requested.* To Whom It May Concern: Pursuant to the Tennessee Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records: Receipts and/or invoices and/or transaction information and/or emails related to Child Evangelism Fellowship and/or the Good New Club payment for facility use fee and/or facility rental fee from January 2022 to present day, emails related to Child Evangelism Fellowship and/or the Good New Club operating at Chimneyrock Elementary from January 2022 to present day, and documents, texts, emails with the keywords "Good News Club" and/or "GNC" and/or "Child Evangelism Fellowship" and/or "CEF" and/or "Satan" from January 2022 to present day. The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes. In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not. Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires. Sincerely, Kent Hoover, a citizen of Tennessee, in coordination with Rachel Janes *Is this a request for inspection or copying of the requested record(s)?* Copying *Proof of Tennessee citizenship by presentation of a valid Tennessee driver’s license (or alternative acceptable form of valid ID) is required as a condition to inspect or receive copies of public records. Please upload that information here.* image1 (1) (10).jpeg View the submission and any attachments by following the link below and using this unique access code: qMm3qgXp7Xf9HeLl View Submission ( ) Shelby County Schools

title: MS Habitual Offender Information (Department of Corrections)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Mississippi Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to request access to public records under Mississippi Public Records Act; Miss. Code Ann. 25-61-1 et seq. Specifically, I am seeking information regarding individuals currently sentenced with a habitual offender sentencing enhancement as outlined in Miss. Code Ann. § 99-19-81, 83.. Specifically, I am requesting details on individuals currently incarcerated for habitual offender laws, including their:
- Names
- Date of conviction
- Inmate ID
- Parole eligibility date 
- Specific offenses they were convicted of
Any available demographic information, such as date of birth, age at arrest, current age, race, gender, county of conviction 
If there are any fees associated with obtaining or copying these records that exceed $100, I request a waiver of all fees. I am making this request on behalf of a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization, and the release of this information is in the public interest, significantly contributing to a better understanding of habitual offender laws. My request for this information is not for commercial purposes.
I kindly ask for a timely response to this request. If the retrieval of these records will take an extended period, please provide an estimated timeline for when I can expect access to or copies of the requested records.
Should you deny any part of this request, I ask that you specify the exemptions that justify withholding the information and provide details about the available appeal procedures as per the law.
Thank you for your attention to this matter. I look forward to your prompt response.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Noelle

title: California Two and Three Strikes Data (Department of Corrections and Rehabilitation)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to request access to public records under Calif. Public Records Act: Gov’t Code  §6250-6268. Specifically, I am seeking information regarding individuals currently sentenced with a two strikes and three-strikes sentencing enhancement as outlined in Penal Code §§ 667(b)-(i) and 1170.12. Specifically, I am requesting details on individuals currently incarcerated for two-strike and three-strike laws, including their:
- Names
- Date of conviction
- Inmate ID
- Parole eligibility date 
- Specific offenses they were convicted of
- Any available demographic information, such as date of birth, age at arrest, current age, race, gender, county of conviction 
If there are any fees associated with obtaining or copying these records that exceed $100, I request a waiver of all fees. I am making this request on behalf of a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization, and the release of this information is in the public interest, significantly contributing to a better understanding of these laws. To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Louisiana Public Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

I am writing to request access to public records under Louisiana Public Records Act; La.R.S. 44:1 etseq. Specifically, I am seeking information regarding individuals currently sentenced with a habitual offender sentencing enhancement as outlined in LSA-R.S. 15:529.. Specifically, I am requesting details on individuals currently incarcerated for habitual offender laws, including their:
- Names
- Date of conviction
- Inmate ID
- Parole eligibility date 
- Specific offenses they were convicted of
- Any available demographic information, such as date of birth, age at arrest, current age, race, gender, county of conviction 

If there are any fees associated with obtaining or copying these records that exceed $100, I request a waiver of all fees. I am making this request on behalf of a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization, and the release of this information is in the public interest, significantly contributing to a better understanding of habitual offender laws. My request for this information is not for commercial purposes.
I kindly ask for a timely response to this request. If the retrieval of these records will take an extended period, please provide an estimated timeline for when I can expect access to or copies of the requested records.
Should you deny any part of this request, I ask that you specify the exemptions that justify withholding the information and provide details about the available appeal procedures as per the law.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Noelle
